ygData.subject: Raid On Kunark? Huh!?
ygData.msgSnippet: It is coming! The expansion for Everquest, Raid on Kunark, will be out this March! I have been waiting for sooooooooo long! I have tons of info on the
ygData.messageBody:
It is coming! The expansion for Everquest, Raid
on Kunark, will be out this March! I have been
waiting for sooooooooo long! I have tons of info on the
expansion, so if you are curious just ask me. It will have a
new continent in the south called Kunark. On that
continent and that continent alone there will be 20+ new
zones, better graphics, and new quests and items! They
have decided not to add to the original continents (or
at least not much)...so you won't be seing new parts
to your favorite areas. There will be a new
race...Ikthar, that will be big Dino/Lizzies...very cool
lookin'...ask me any questions...I might just be able to
answer. =)
